metadata.Title: CVE-2021-46872 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in Nim before 1.6.2. The RST module of the Nim language stdlib, as used in NimForum and other products, permits the javascript: URI scheme and thus can lead to XSS in some applications. (Nim versions 1.6.2 and later are fixed; there may be backports of the fix to some earlier versions. NimForum 2.2.0 is fixed.)

criterions.comment: nim: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
